content.question: public static int mystery(boolean a, boolean b, boolean c) { int answer = 7; if (!a) { answer += 1; } if (b) { answer += 2; } if (c) { answer += 4; } return answer; } Which of the following method calls will return the value 11 ?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
